si.title: யார் பொதுவேட்பாளர்; பொதுக் கட்டமைப்பின் சில முக்கிய தீர்மானங்கள்!
body_lines: தமிழ்த் தேசியக் கட்சிகளுக்கும் தமிழ் மக்கள் பொதுச் சபைக்கும் இடையில் உருவாக்கப்பட்டுள்ள பொதுக் கட்டமைப்பு சில முக்கிய தீர்மானங்களை ஞாயிற்றுக்கிழமை (28) எடுத்துள்ளது.

தமிழ்த் தேசிய பொதுக் கட்டமைப்பின் விசேட கூட்டம் யாழ் நகரிலுள்ள தனியார் விருந்தினர் விடுதியில் நடைபெற்ற போதே பொதுக் கட்டமைப்பின் அடுத்தகட்ட நடவடிக்கைகள் தொடர்பாக ஆராய்ந்து  முக்கிய சில தீர்மானங்கள் எடுக்கப்பட்டுள்ளது.
සිවිල් සමාජ නියෝජිතයෙකු වන නිලන්තන්, සිවිල් සමාජ නියෝජිතයෙකු සහ සාමාන්ය ව්යුහයේ සාමාජිකයෙකු මාධ්යයට අදහස් දැක්වීය. ඔහු කිව්වා ..
දෙමළ ජාතික දේශපාලන පක්ෂ සහ දෙමළ ජාතික දේශපාලන මණ්ඩලයේ සහ දෙමළ ජාතික දේශපාලන මණ්ඩලයේ දෙමළ ජාතික මහා සභා ආයතනයේ දෙමළ ජාතික මහා සභාවේ පළමු රැස්වීම අද පැවැත්විණි.
මෙම කාලය තුළ, සාමාන්ය අපේක්ෂකයා නැවැත්වීම පිළිබඳ විවිධ ගැටළු සම්බන්ධයෙන් අපි තීරණ කිහිපයක් ගෙන ඇත්තෙමු.

මෙයින් අදහස් කරන්නේ මෙම පොදු ව්යුහය යටතේ ඇති වන උප ව්යුහයන් නිර්මාණය කර ඇති බවයි. අපේක්ෂකයා කවුරුන්ද යන්න මැතිවරණ ප්රකාශනය තීරණය කිරීම සහ පක්ෂ සංකේතය තීරණය කිරීම සඳහා මූල්ය හා ප්රචාරයන් සඳහා උප ව්යුහයන් නිර්මාණය කර ඇත.
ඒ අනුව නිසි ව්යුහයන් කාලෝචිත ආකාරයකින් ප්රකාශයට පත් කරන බව ඔහු පැවසීය.

en.title: Who is the general candidate;Some of the main resolutions of the general structure!
body_lines: The general structure between the Tamil national parties and the Tamil People's General Assembly has taken some important resolutions on Sunday (28).
A special meeting of the Tamil National General Framework was held at a private guest hostel in Jaffna and some important decisions were taken to investigate the next step of the public structure.
Political analyst Nilanthan, a civil society representative and a member of the general structure, commented to the media. He said ..
The first meeting of the Tamil National General Assembly between the Tamil National Political Parties and the Tamil People's General Assembly was held today.
During this time, we have taken some decisions on the various issues on the suspension of the general candidate.

This means that sub -structures that come under this public structure have been created. Sub -structures for financial and propaganda have been created to know who the candidate is, to determine the election manifesto, and to determine the party symbol.
Accordingly, the proper structures will be announced in a timely manner, he added.

summary_lines: The Tamil National General Assembly, comprising Tamil political parties and the Tamil People's General Assembly, met to discuss the future direction and key decisions regarding the general candidate selection process. This includes establishing sub-committees for finance, propaganda, and candidate identification, as well as determining the election manifesto and party symbol. The assembly aims to announce these structures promptly, signaling a significant step forward in the public structure's evolution.
